participant_1.name: Linda
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and nurturing, with a love for family and a playful spirit.
participant_1.background: I'm the one always tripping over my own two feet while running track. I think I should bake my grandson some chocolate cake for his birthday. I love to eat shrimp and lobster. I took a vacation to visit my poppa and play with his train set. My favorite TV show is Game of Thrones.

participant_2.name: Nathan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and creative, with a passion for music and exploration.
participant_2.background: I don't own a home, but I do enjoy playing music and interacting with my listeners. I enjoy reading about cycling because of my family's passion for it. My favorite music is Jimi Hendrix. My favorite thing about my last vacation was eating at the local restaurants. I like to go for bike rides.

content.text: I enjoy reading about cycling, it's a passion of my family's.
I love to bike too! Where is your favorite place to go for a ride?
I recently took a vacation to the beach and loved biking along the shore.
That sounds great! I love the ocean. I love to watch the waves come in.
I do too! I think it's so relaxing.
No, but I love animals. I would love to have a dog someday.
I have a dog and a cat. They are my best friends.
That's awesome! I've always wanted a dog, but I live in an apartment right now and it wouldn't be fair to leave it alone all day.
I know what you mean. I love having animals but they do take a lot of responsibility.
